description: Featuring their Word logo, and created to blend natural comfort and technical performance, this long-sleeve is your all-season tee. Combining soft, durable organically grown cotton with the performance of polyester, the Captive feels great and stays cool. The trim fit streamlines the look and makes layering easy, and gusseted underarms and light stretch give you freedom to move.
name: Arcteryx Captive ArcWord LS - Mens
